com.aurel.track.lucene.index

Class LuceneIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.lucene.index.LuceneIndexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LuceneIndexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Utility methods for lucene indexing Reindexing runs in his own thread

      static void addToWorkItemIndex(java.util.List<TWorkItemBean> workItemBeans, java.lang.Integer fieldID)
      Adds a list of TWorkItems to the workItem index Used by recreating the index
      static void addToWorkItemIndex(TWorkItemBean workItemBean, boolean deleteExisting)
      Adds a TWorkItem to the workitem index Used by creating a new and by updating (delete old and create new) of an existing workItem Although workItemBean contains no history bean it is not needed because by creating only an "emtpy" state change history is created.

      All IndexWriters should be closed by system shutdown in order to release the locks

      • initWriter

        public static org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter initWriter(boolean created,
                                             int index)
        Initializes an IndexWriter. It will be called from the following places: - on system startup workItemWriter should be initialized! created = false if no reindex at startup created = true if reindex at startup - before explicit reIndexing: created = true - after reindexing: create = false; During the adding/editing/deleting of index data the IndexWriter should be initialized with created = false!
        Parameters:
        created -
        index -

      • initIndexWriters

        Initialize all the IndexWriters (by starting the application) for modifications
        Parameters:

      • closeWriters

        public static void closeWriters()
        All IndexWriters should be closed by system shutdown in order to release the locks

      • reIndexWorkItems

        public void reIndexWorkItems()
        Reindexes all workitems. The custom attributes and the history beans should be set for each workItemBean

      • addToWorkItemIndex

        public static void addToWorkItemIndex(java.util.List<TWorkItemBean> workItemBeans,
                      java.lang.Integer fieldID)
        Adds a list of TWorkItems to the workItem index Used by recreating the index
        Parameters:
        workItemBeans -
        fieldID - the beans are considered to be fully prepared: i.e. history beans and custom attributes are set

      • updateWorkItemIndex

        public static void updateWorkItemIndex(int[] workItemBeanIDs,
                       java.lang.Integer fieldID)
        Updates the workItemBean index with a modified TWorkItemBean Deletes the old document and create a new one
        Parameters:
        workItemBeanIDs -
        -

      • addToWorkItemIndex

        public static void addToWorkItemIndex(TWorkItemBean workItemBean,
                      boolean deleteExisting)
        Adds a TWorkItem to the workitem index Used by creating a new and by updating (delete old and create new) of an existing workItem Although workItemBean contains no history bean it is not needed because by creating only an "emtpy" state change history is created. However it contains the custom attribute values.
        Parameters:
        workItemBean -

      • deleteFromWorkItemIndex

        public static void deleteFromWorkItemIndex(java.util.List<TWorkItemBean> workItemBeans,
                           java.lang.Integer fieldID,
                           boolean deleteProject)
        Removes a list of TWorkItems from the workitem index Used by deleting a project (for deleting all of its workitems)
        Parameters:
        workItemBeans -
